price: Dájúdájú Allāhu, Òun ni Olùpèsè, Alágbára líle.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha huwa al-razāqu dhū al-quwati al-matīnu
